name: balena-universal-ga
description: A CommonJS wrapper for both Node.js and browser (async) version of Google Analytics library

scripts.lint: balena-lint -e js -e ts --typescript src/browser.js src/ga-loader.d.ts src/node.js
scripts.lint-fix: balena-lint -e js -e ts --typescript --fix src/browser.js src/ga-loader.d.ts src/node.js
